3rd Floor Phone Monitoring Room (MCC New York)
keyFacts: On August 8, 2019, the NICEVision camera system at MCC New York failed, preventing the recovery of any video footage from the 5-South Housing Unit.

The system failure was discovered at approximately 3:45 PM during a review attempt, and a Communication Technician confirmed at 4:00 PM that the cameras were not recording and footage was irretrievable.
The technician scheduled the repair for the following day, Friday, August 9, 2019.
The memorandum was written on August 10, 2019, documenting the incident and the lack of video surveillance during that period.
